Package uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.io

Interface MultiElementIdInput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, Input<Iterable<? extends ElementId>>, MultiInput<ElementId>, Operation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GetElements, GetJavaRDDOfElements, GetRDDOfElements
    public interface MultiElementIdInput
extends MultiInput<ElementId>
    MultiElementIdInput operations are Gaffer operations which consume multiple ElementIds.

    • Method Detail

      • setInputFromVerticesAndIds

        default void setInputFromVerticesAndIds​(Object... input)
        Sets the input from an array of vertices and element ids. Vertices are wrapped in an EntitySeed object.
        Parameters:
        input - the input array to set.
